sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā jīntiān xiǎnde hěn kāixīn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle a l'air très heureuse aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She seems very happy today.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhīshi shì zuì hǎo de wǔqì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La connaissance est la meilleure arme.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Knowledge is the best weapon.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā cāntīng hěn yǒumíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce restaurant est très célèbre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This restaurant is very famous.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ míngbai nǐ de yìsi le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je comprends ce que tu veux dire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I understand what you mean.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiǎnrán tā bù zhīdào zhè jiàn shì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Évidemment, il ne sait pas cette affaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Obviously he doesn't know about this.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 中国西部有很多美丽的风景。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōngguó xībù yǒu hěn duō měilì de fēngjǐng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'ouest de la Chine a de nombreux beaux paysages.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Western China has many beautiful sceneries.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiàndài kējì fāzhǎn hěn kuài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La technologie moderne se développe rapidement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Modern technology is developing rapidly.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ xiǎng hē chá huòzhě kāfēi?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu veux du thé ou du café ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Do you want tea or coffee?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng zài zhè tiáo xiàn hòumiàn páiduì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez faire la queue derrière cette ligne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please line up behind this line.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jǐngchá yǐjīng dàodá xiànchǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La police est déjà arrivée sur les lieux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The police have already arrived at the scene.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen bìxū miànduì xiànshí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons faire face à la réalité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We must face reality.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè qíguài de xiànxiàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un phénomène étrange.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a strange phenomenon.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi xiānghù zūnzhòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devrions nous respecter mutuellement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We should respect each other.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè liǎng fú huà fēicháng xiāngsì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ces deux tableaux sont très similaires.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: These two paintings are very similar.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè duǒ huā hěn xiāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette fleur sent très bon.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This flower smells very fragrant.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài nóngcūn zhǎngdà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a grandi à la campagne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He grew up in the countryside.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tàiyáng xiāoshī zài yún hòumiàn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le soleil a disparu derrière les nuages.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The sun disappeared behind the clouds.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ xìn fàngjìn xìnfēng lǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez mettre la lettre dans l'enveloppe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please put the letter in the envelope.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们要客观地分析问题。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào kèguān de fēnxī wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons analyser le problème objectivement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We should analyze the problem objectively.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ tīngdào le yī gè hǎo xiāoxi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai entendu une bonne nouvelle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I heard a piece of good news.
